ygData.subject: Re: Hello EQ Rainbow
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh my! The board lays practically dormant for weeks.... until a topic about size come up. And who said gay men were single minded.... Swin ... talking about
ygData.messageBody:
Oh my!

The board lays practically dormant for weeks.... until a topic about
size come up.

And who said gay men were single minded....

Swin
